ai-ps2.2:23.1_0: “Mendicants, before my awakening—when I was still unawakened but intent on awakening—I thought,
ai-ps2.2:23.2_0: ‘What’s the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to form ...
ai-ps2.2:23.3_0: And what is feeling’s gratification, drawback, and escape?
ai-ps2.2:23.4_0: What’s the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to perception ...
ai-ps2.2:23.5_0: What’s the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to choices?
ai-ps2.2:23.8_0: ‘The pleasure and happiness that arise from form: this is its gratification.
ai-ps2.2:23.10_0: That form is impermanent, suffering, and perishable: this is its drawback.
ai-ps2.2:23.11_0: This is the drawback of form.
ai-ps2.2:23.12_0: Removing and giving up desire and greed for form: this is its escape. ...
ai-ps2.2:23.13_0: This is the escape from form.
ai-ps2.2:23.14_0: The pleasure and happiness that arise from feeling ...
ai-ps2.2:23.17_0: The pleasure and happiness that arise from consciousness: this is its gratification.
ai-ps2.2:23.19_0: That consciousness is impermanent, suffering, and perishable: this is its drawback.
ai-ps2.2:23.20_0: This is the drawback of consciousness.
ai-ps2.2:23.21_0: Removing and giving up desire and greed for consciousness: this is its escape. ...
ai-ps2.2:23.22_0: This is the escape from consciousness.’
ai-ps2.2:24.1_0: As long as I didn’t truly understand these five grasping aggregates’ gratification, drawback, and escape in this way for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
ai-ps2.2:24.2_0: And knowledge and vision arose in me:
ai-ps2.2:24.4_0: Facing north, he takes seven strides with a white parasol held above him, surveys all quarters, and makes this dramatic proclamation: “I am the foremost in the world! I am the eldest in the world! I am the first in the world! This is my last rebirth. Now there are no more future lives.”’”

ai-ps2.2:25.5_0: Removing and giving up desire and greed for form: this is its escape.
